text: Denise’s mom and grandma, CATHERINE and ERNESTINE, are wi Catherine's friend, JOYCE. They’re prepping for Thanksgiv dinner while watching the Price is Right.
Where Denise at?
She’s upstairs with her little boyfriend.
Oh, wait, Denise got a little boyfriend?!
Mm-hmm. Two kids, around age 8, run in. It’s KID DEV and KID DENI Denise is dressed femininely and conservatively.
Y’all better stop running through this house.
Yes, Grandma.
Denise, what were y'all doing up there?
Watching Fresh Prince.
You weren’t eating candy, were you?
No.
Dev, do y'all even celebrate Thanksgiving in your house? Is that a thing y’all do in the Indian community?
We have lunch together. Then my dad watches The Godfather and falls asleep.
(laughs) Well, you are welcome to come have Thanksgiving with us anytime you want. (CONTINUED)
MASTER OF NONE “Thanksgiving” [208] 2. Pink Revision Pages 10/19/16
What’s “the Indian community”?
Dev is Indian.
Wait... I thought Dev was black.
I’m brown!
Black people are brown too!
Oh lord. Okay, look, both of you are minorities.
What’s a minority?
It’s a group of people that have to work twice as hard in life to get half as far. And Denise, you a black woman, so you gonna have to work three times as hard.
I know that’s right.
Mm-hmm. You’re both gonna be disenfranchised. Ma.
I’m coming.
Like a McDonald's?
What?
McDonald’s is a franchise. When people open up their own McDonald's, they just pay the big McDonald’s man a license fee so they can run it. That’s what a franchise is. (CONTINUED)
MASTER OF NONE “Thanksgiving” [208] 3. Pink Revision Pages 10/19/16
Denise, how the hell do you know what a franchise is, but you don’t know that Dev ain’t black?
I’m confused. I’m a McDonald’s? Catherine is exasperated.
You're a McDonald's and Denise is a Burger King. Now, both of y’all sit on down so we can get ready to eat. Denise and Dev sit at the table.
And I’m a big old White Castle, so... Everyone laughs.
Ooh, this looks good.
We gonna say grace first.
Oh. OPENING CREDITS.
Catherine, Ernestine, and Joyce do their Thanksgiving pre circa 1995.
Ooh, tell your mama to stop smoking in the kitchen.
Child, I’m old. I can smoke wherever I want.
Dropping ashes all in the potatoes...
It adds flavor.
I don’t want no Newport potatoes. (CONTINUED)
MASTER OF NONE “Thanksgiving” [208] 4. Pink Revision Pages 10/19/16
I was trying to help. INT. WATKINS FAMILY APARTMENT —- PRE-TEEN DENISE’S ROOM - 1995

TIGHT SHOT: A music video on a small TV in Denise’s room: “Brown Sugar” by D’Angelo. Pull out to REVEAL: PRE-TEEN DEV and PRE-TEEN DENISE are older, around 12. Dev is wearing a suit. They are dancing having fun. There are posters on the wall of Jasmine Guy, Jennifer Aniston, Hilary from Fresh Prince, Whitney Houst
(singing) “Skin is caramel/ With the cocoa eyes/ Even got a big sister by the name of Chocolate Thai.” Catherine opens the door.
(singing) “Brown sugar baaaabe, I get high off your love, don’t know how to behave.”

What are y’all doing in here? Dev, now, what you know bout brown sugar. You’re 12 years old. You still got some of your baby teeth. Now y’all ain’t got no business listening to these songs. Look at Denise over there, staring at D’Angelo. Cut to the TV. Denise is actually staring at the woman in video. Catherine hangs a pink, fluffy dress on Denise’s closet door.
Denise, put on your dress so you can look nice for dinner. Denise looks at the dress, skeptical. INT. WATKINS FAMILY APARTMENT - PRE-TEEN DENISE’S ROOM -
Denise has the dress on, she looks at herself in the mirr She makes a disgusted face.
Man, this is some bullshit.  MASTER OF NONE “Thanksgiving” [208] 5. Pink Revision Pages 10/19/16

Dev and the family are downstairs. Denise comes down dres “Denise style” but in kids mode - blue jean overalls, Cro Colors shirt, and some LA Gear sneakers. She walks downst in slow motion as “Flava in Ya Ear (remix)” by Craig Mack
Denise, that does not look like the clothes I picked out for you! What happened to that nice dress?
It didn't fit right!
You better make it fit.
Why can’t I just wear this? It’s just us. Arsenio ain’t coming?
Arsenio is coming?!
No!
Catherine, let that child wear what she wanna wear. And you watch your tone.
Thanks, Aunt Joyce.
All right, Ernestine, hurry up and say this prayer.

Thank you, Jesus, for bringing all our family together in one room for another Watkins family Thanksgiving. I want to bless all the hands that made the food. I want to bless the family that’s here today. I also want to bless the extended family that’s here, little Dev. I also want to bless--
We got it. God is able. Jesus wept. Can we please talk about 0.J.? (CONTINUED)
MASTER OF NONE “Thanksgiving” [208] 6. Pink Revision Pages 10/19/16
I don’t know what we gonna talk about. He didn’t do it.
What about all that blood? How you know, Grandma?
‘Cause I just know!
Ooh, if Nicole was black, we wouldn't even be talking about this.
I know that’s right.
Honey, they are always trying take down our black icons.
Mm-hmm.
Look at Michael!
Oh!
I still don’t believe he touched them kids.
Child, anytime these folks see a black man coming up in the world, making himself enough money to get himself a white woman, they try to frame him.
What about Clarence Thomas?
Fuck his ass.
Catherine and Ernestine prep for Thanksgiving. Time has advanced a few years, circa 1999. (CONTINUED)
MASTER OF NONE “Thanksgiving” [208] 7. Pink Revision Pages 10/19/16
You didn’t put no parsnips in that dressing, did you?
No, Mama. No parsnips.

That's my least favorite vegetable. I hate them suckers. 9 INT. WATKINS FAMILY APARTMENT - TEEN DENISE’S ROOM — DA 1999 TEEN DENISE and TEEN DEV, around age 16, playing cards. Denise is wearing baggy clothes, Tommy Hilfiger, FUBU. A version of current Denise attire.
Man, I told you this is stupid. You can’t play spades with two people.
I’m trying to make it work. You wanted to play spades. Let’s see if Aunt Joyce wants to play.
She got a gambling problem. She can’t be around playing cards no more. Teen Denise puts her cards down. TEEN DENISE (CONT’D) Hey, could I talk to you about something?
Yeah, sure. What’s up?
You know Erica?
White Erica or black Erica?
Nah, mixed Erica.
Oh, yeah, I know mixed Erica. She’s cute.
Nah, mixed Erica’s fine as hell. (CONTINUED)
MASTER OF NONE “Thanksgiving” [208] 8. Pink Revision Pages 10/19/16
Okay...
That's what I’m trying to say. Like... I like her. I have a crush on her.
Wait, are you trying to tell me that you're... you know?
Lebanese.
What? You’re from Lebanon?
No. I just-- I don’t know how to-- I’m not comfortable with the word, uh... (quietly) Lesbian.

All right. So we’ll say you’re Lebanese. I mean, I always thought there was a good chance. You’re the only girl who wore Jordans to the Spring Fling. And you got those Jasmine Guy posters up for years. I always felt like it wasn’t about her acting.
And I have been dressing like Da Brat since preschool.
You gonna tell your mom?
Being gay isn’t exactly something black people love to talk about.
Why?
Some black people think being gay’s a choice. And when they find out that their kid is gay, they try to figure out what they did wrong. (CONTINUED)
9 10 11 MASTER OF NONE “Thanksgiving” [208] 9. Pink Revision Pages 10/19/16
Gay Martin’s white. His parents did the same thing.
Yeah, but it’s more intense for black folks. All right, so everything's a contest for us, and your kids are like trophies. Me being gay is like tarnishing her trophy.
I don’t think being Lebanese tarnishes the trophy. There’s plenty of straight trophies. I think it’s cool you're a Lebanese trophy.
Thanks, dude.

Damn, this has been an intense talk. (beat) You want to smoke some weed? I got some shit that’s DANK. Teen Dev pulls out a ziplock bag with the tiniest amount the saddest-looking weed you have ever seen. INT. WATKINS FAMILY APARTMENT - TEEN DENISE’S ROOM — DAY 1999

MUSIC: Musical Youth - Pass the Dutchie. STYLIZED MONTAGE: Teen Dev and Teen Denise are smoking we and blowing the smoke through a paper towel roll with a d sheet in it, into the fan. INT. WATKINS FAMILY APARTMENT - TEEN DENISE’S ROOM — DAY
Teen Dev is spacing out in front of a psychedelic poster.
Are you sure I’m supposed to see a dolphin? I don’t see a dolphin. Teen Denise is lying on her bed, lost in a poster of Jenn Anniston pasted to her ceiling.
I don’t know, man. I’m in another world right now. (CONTINUED)
MASTER OF NONE “Thanksgiving” [208] 10. Pink Revision Pages 10/19/16
Denise? Dev?
Oh shit! I thought she was going to the store.
Me too! Be cool!
I’m cool! You be cool!
12 Shut up! 12 Teen Denise and Teen Dev unpause a video game and act lik they have been playing.
What y’all up to? Catherine enters.
Hi Ms. Watk -- AHHHHHHH!!! REVEAL: Catherine has a white cream mask on. Her face is covered in white goop.
What the hell, ma?!
It's just a hydrating mask. You know I got a dry T-zone! What you freaking out for?
We freaking out ‘cause you’re coming in here looking like Dead Presidents! Teen Dev is scared. TEEN DENISE (CONT’D) You're supposed to be at the store. Why are you here?
Yeah, I was going. Shoot, Joyce say she can handle it. (beat) Dev, how are your parents? They good? (CONTINUED)
Pink Revision Pages
Catherine NONE “Thanksgiving” (2)
Yeah.
I heard y’all were going to Hawaii for Christmas. You excited?
(beat) Yeah.
Well, this has been a stimulating conversation.
Yeah.
Okay, bye, Mom.
Uh-uh.
Bye, okay?
Girl, don't be telling me where I can go in my own house. Don’t you be telling me where I can go in my own house. (beat) Are you all right? ‘Cause I swear, y’all look a little spaced out.
We're just tired!
Uh-huh. All right, I’m leaving. I’1l see y'all later for dinner. (leaving the room) You really need to clean all this up. I’ma give this to the Goodwill, somebody who appreciate it. exits.
D-did I seem too high? Was that-- was I cool? [208] 11. 10/19/16 11 (CONTINUED)
11 14 15 MASTER OF NONE “Thanksgiving” [208] Pink Revision Pages 10/19/16
We cool. I’ma just kick it with Jen real quick. Denise lies back down on her bed to stare at the poster.
Time has advanced a few years, Thanksgiving morning circa 12. 11 14 15 2006. Denise (now played by Lena) is home from college. S wearing a hoodie and sweatpants. REVEAL: Denise is with Catherine.
How are you this tall and you don’t play basketball?
I know, it sucks.
A basketball scholarship would’ve come in real handy right now. But, I’m just glad you in college and you ain’t pregnant and on drugs.
You don’t got to worry about me getting pregnant.
Why? You got that UID thing? Denise is grossed out by the thought.
Okay, first of all, it’s not a UID. Okay? It’s not a thing. It’s the IUD.
Mm.
But you ain’t got to worry about me and pregnancy.
(beat) You got saved. You done come to the Lord.
No. I don’t know why you keep asking me that. (CONTINUED)
15 MASTER OF NONE “Thanksgiving” [208] 13. Pink Revision Pages 10/19/16
15 Catherine shrugs.
I’m not... gonna get pregnant because... I don’t like having sex with men. Catherine takes this in. It’s not a shock but it’s still moment.
Have you tried it?
No.
Then how do you know you don’t like it?
It's just something I know.
(beat) Well, what you trying to say? Denise seems annoyed.
What’s is the problem?
I’m just annoyed that I even have to have this conversation with you.
What conversation? I’m sitting here being normal. You acting like a crazy person.
Ma?
Hmm?
I’m gay. Catherine looks around the restaurant wondering if anyone heard her daughter.
You what? (CONTINUED)
15 MASTER OF NONE “Thanksgiving” [208] 14. Pink Revision Pages 10/19/16
I’m gay. Denise can tell her mom’s uncomfortable and a little embarrassed.
I’ve always been gay. Catherine is still at a loss for words.
But I’m still the same person. I’m still your daughter. Nothing’s changed. Denise sees there are tears in her mother’s eyes. This, o course, breaks her heart.
What’s wrong? Ma, why are you crying?
Mm-mm. Mm-mm.
I just-- I don’t want life to be hard for you. (beat) It is hard enough being a black woman in this world. Now you want add something else to that?
It’s not like this was my choice. It’s just who I am.
Well, who else you done told?
Just Dev.
Yeah, of course. (then) You know you can’t tell your grandmother.
Why?
“Cause she won’t be able to handle this. And you know forgetful she is. (MORE ) (CONTINUED)
MASTER OF NONE “Thanksgiving” [208] 15. Pink Revision Pages 10/19/16
You’re gonna have to come out to her every other week.
True. She do be forgetting stuff. Catherine sighs. 16 INT. WATKINS FAMILY APARTMENT - COLLEGE DENISE’S ROOM 2006 Denise and Dev are back in her room hanging out.
So how'd it go?
Well, it wasn’t my all time favorite conversation with my mom, but it was all right. She cried, though.
Oh man.
I figured she would. She’s a crier.
Did she tell you she loves you and supports you no matter what and all that stuff?
No, man. This ain’t an episode of Growing Pains. She ain't say none of that. But at lease she didn’t disown me, ‘cause that be happening. So... I guess it was a success.
Catherine and Joyce are downstairs in the kitchen prepari dinner.
So, she’s a butch queen?
(whispering) No. I think that’s something else in the gay world. (CONTINUED)
MASTER OF NONE “Thanksgiving” [208] 16. Pink Revision Pages 10/19/16
Well, that’s a world I don’t know nothing about, child.
I just wish I knew where I went wrong.

What do you mean where you went wrong? Denise ain’t never been arrested, she’s in college, she keep a job, and she respects her elders. Honey, she want to lay around with some women, baby that is her business.
Maybe I just should've spent more time with her.
You spent plenty of time with that girl.
Is this ‘cause I couldn’t keep a man?
(laughs ) You not being able yo keep a man a whole ‘nother conversation.
Please.
But being gay ain’t got nothing to do with that.
Oh, I know. I just never thought I would have a gay daughter.
Well, get used to it. ‘Cause one of these days she gone bring home one of her little girlfriends. Catherine cringes at the thought.
Oh, Lord. Oh Lord! (beat) Well, I just hope she don’t bring home no white girl, ‘cause I don’t want to see no Jennifer Anistons up in here. (CONTINUED)
17 18 19 MASTER OF NONE “Thanksgiving” [208] 17. Pink Revision Pages 10/19/16
Oh, honey, Becky is coming. And Megan. And Katie. (laughs) All right, let’s-- I’m gonna finish the peas.
Catherine, Ernestine, and Joyce’s Thanksgiving prep. This takes place during Season 1, in 2015.
Girl, it was about to get serious, but I can’t date nobody with a collection of pinkie rings.
Why not? Ain’t nothing wrong with a little jewelry. You were toe rings.
I dated a pimp once. INT. WATKINS FAMILY APARTMENT - MODERN DENISE’S ROOM - DA 2015
Denise and Dev back in the room. Dev is on an Elliptical. Denise is pacing, nervously.
Dev, Dev, get them steps. Dev, Dev, Get them steps. Man, I can’t believe your mom turned your room into a gym. Pretty harsh.
You know my mom likes to stay fit.
What time’s Michelle getting here?
She should be here soon.
You nervous?
Hell, yeah. It’s the first time my family’s gonna see me with a woman. My grandma don’t really know I’m gay yet, so she still thinks she’s my “friend.” (CONTINUED)
MASTER OF NONE “Thanksgiving” [208] 18. Pink Revision Pages 10/19/16
All right. Don’t stress. I’m here. It’s gonna be fine.
Have you talked to your parents about Rachel yet?
No.
They don’t know y’all live together?
No.
I feel like all three of them are gonna get mad at you about that.
Why would they be mad?
Stupid. Just then they hear the DOORBELL RING. They head downstai
Shit, here she is. Come on.
Michelle in the cut. Dev gets off the Elliptical.
Ooh, my legs are sore. Jesus.
A knock at the door. Denise comes down the stairs. Dev follows.
I got it! I got it! (to Dev) Hey, yo, give me a second.
Sure, sure. (CONTINUED)
MASTER OF NONE “Thanksgiving” [208] 19. Pink Revision Pages 10/19/16
Denise opens the door to greet MICHELLE who walks in hold a bottle of wine. She’s an attractive black woman who wal with confidence.
Hey, boo.
Hey.
You’re looking cute.
Mm. Thank you. Denise greets her with an innocent kiss on the cheek. Catherine watches Denise and Michelle from the dining roo pretending to set the table.
Thanks for the wine.
You know I have class.
Uh-huh. Aunt Joyce gonna love you. Catherine works her way over to the door to meet Michelle
Ma, this is Michelle.
Michelle, this in my mom, Catherine.
It’s so great to--
Nice to meet you. Michelle goes for a hug - but Catherine sticks out her ha for a handshake. It turns into an awkward half hug, half handshake. CATHERINE (CONT’D) Yes. (CONTINUED)
20 MASTER OF NONE “Thanksgiving” [208] 20. Pink Revision Pages 10/19/16
Okay.
Welcome...
Okay.
To our home.
That was awkward. Joyce, and Ernestine are standing in a line waiting to me Michelle.
Uh, this is my Aunt Joyce.

Oh, it’s so great to finally meet-- Michelle then goes to shake her hand - but for some reaso Joyce uncomfortably grabs Michelle’s hand. Michelle plays off and turns her one sided handshake into an awkward wav
How you doing?
What the hell? Really, Joyce? (beat) Okay, anyway, this is my grandma Ernestine.
Hello, there.
Ooh. Ernestine walks over to Michelle, using her cane, and giv Michelle a warm hug. This is the only greeting that doesn feel weird. Michelle hugs her back and smiles.
This is my friend Michelle.
Welcome, darling. (CONTINUED)
20 MASTER OF NONE “Thanksgiving” [208] 21. Pink Revision Pages 10/19/16
Thank you.
Okay, Grandma. Dev walks in.
That’s Dev.
Hey. Friend of Denise’s. No relation to the Watkins.
Yeah, I figured.
Yeah, the whole me-being-Indian thing probably tipped you off. Fun Denise fact: when we were kids, Denise thought I was black.
Okay. Don’t make me break out the Halloween pictures, all right? Remember when you went as Indian Peter Pan?
Damn, why you got to hate on the Pan? Remember when we were black and Indian Mario and Luigi? That was cute.
Shut up. Joyce notices Michelle’s wine bottle and grabs it.
Oh, that look like the expensive shit.
All right, come on.
All right, Michelle. I see what you're doing. Hey, yeah!
Good to meet you, Michelle. Dev and Joyce leave for another room leaving Denise, Catherine, and Michelle to stand around awkwardly. (CONTINUED)
20 21 MASTER OF NONE “Thanksgiving” [208] 22. Pink Revision Pages 10/19/16
Okay. Thanks, Ma.
Oh.
Get out of here. Catherine leaves. Denise is at a loss for words as she removes Michelle’s coat.
They're nice.
Mm-hmm.
They-- they are. They’re great.
2015 The family and Dev sit around the table eating Thanksgivi dinner. No one is talking. It’s super awkward. You can he the silverware scraping against the china.
Um, Denise, maybe we can take Michelle to that Chinese restaurant in Flushing I was telling you about.
Yeah, that sounds cool.
Dev, why you plotting your next meal and you ain’t finished the one in front of you?
Never too early to plan ahead, especially when it comes to matters of the tum. Dev clicks his tongue.
Well, speaking of Chinese food, Michelle was living in China earlier this year. No one reacts. (CONTINUED)
MASTER OF NONE “Thanksgiving” [208] 23. Pink Revision Pages 10/19/16
A pause. 21
What to tell them about that, babe?

Yeah, um... I was living in Shanghai for about two months for work. Mostly I just took pictures with people who thought I was Beyoncé. This one restaurant even put my photo up on the wall. I just didn’t have the heart to tell them the truth.
I’ve always wanted to go to China. Looks cool.
Yeah, it is.
Ma? Aunt Joyce? Grandma? Y’all have any thoughts on that? Joyce and Catherine are still uncomfortable.
Well, you know my hearing is bad. Where did she go?
China.
Hmm?
(screaming) China! She went to China, Grandma!
Mm.

(screaming) She lived in Shanghai for two months for work! And a lot of people thought she was Beyoncé! And this one restaurant even put her photo on the wall, but she didn’t have the heart to tell them!
Oh. I always liked China. (CONTINUED)
MASTER OF NONE “Thanksgiving” [208] 24, Pink Revision Pages 10/19/16
Mm.
You must be really smart.
Oh.
You're smart, and you’re cute. You don’t usually get both of those in the same package. Usually you only get one or the other.

Oh, thank you very much. I could say the same thing about Denise. Denise smiles at Michelle. She instinctively goes in for kiss, but she clocks Catherine’s uneasiness and stops herself. Joyce pours Catherine a glass of wine.
Thanks.
Mm. Joyce takes a pull straight from the bottle. Catherine do her glass and glares at Denise. The room is tense.
(screaming) Grandma Ernestine, your yams turned out really nice this year! You add a little nutmeg?
Hmm?
(screaming) I said your yams turned out really nice this year! Did you add a little nutmeg? Joyce snaps and slams the table.

She added nutmeg! Don’t you ask another fucking question. Nutmeg, cinnamon, whatever the hell! You know what go in the damn yams!  22 23 24 MASTER OF NONE “Thanksgiving” [208] 25. Pink Revision Pages 10/19/16
Denise and Catherine are in the kitchen cleaning up.
I don’t have any appreciation for what was going on at my table.
What are you talking about?
If you wanna bring your friend over here, that’s fine, but don’t be making eyes and rubbing backs and getting all fresh.
I wasn’t doing that.
Oh, yes, you were. I saw you. I know that look. Oh, you used to make that look for Rachel from Friends. I always thought you were looking at Joey.
Joey? Ma, are you serious? That character was an idiot.
Look, you can be lesbian if you want to - but when you come up in here, you gonna respect my house.
Thanksgiving 2016 prep with Catherine, Ernestine, and Joy INT. WATKINS FAMILY APARTMENT - MODERN DENISE’S ROOM - DA 2016 Dev riffles through old VHS tapes in Denise’s room.
Problem Child Two. Oh, shit. What else we got? Denise and Dev's tap dancer song of nineteen ninety-one? Should we fire this up? You remember the routine? Dev starts tapping.
‘Cause I don't. (CONTINUED)

I know. But I want to look it up beforehand, get a vibe.
(sighs) I forgot.
You forgot, look it up.
(sighs) NipplesAndToes23.
Whoa. What's that?
NipplesAndToes23.

I know, man. I'm trying to get her to change it. (CONTINUED)

Dev heads out.
2016 Everyone is eating Thanksgiving dinner, including NIKKI.

See that's the thing about Sandra Bland, you know. It's like she reminded me so much of myself. Like, she was woke, she was confident, she didn't take no shit. (sighs) But the scary thing is, that's what got her killed.
If Sandra was white, we wouldn’t even be having this conversation.
Mm. Yeah, you got that right.
Mm-hmm.
Yep.
That's why I keep telling y'all, if the police pull you over, just nod your head. A-And shut the fuck up. Nikki is on her phone.
Yo, Dev, what about that Indian grandpa?

Oh, yeah. It's big on the Indian people e- mail chains I'm on. So, apparently there was this Indian grandpa in Alabama and he was walking around his neighborhood and some lady called the cops and said, "Oh, there's a black guy walking around." And so the cops are like, "We'll look into it." And they go over there and they try to talk to him and he doesn't speak English. So, he's confused. He hasn't done anything wrong, he tries to walk away. Cop just grabs him, slams him on the ground face first, he's paralyzed now. (CONTINUED)
MASTER OF NONE “Thanksgiving” [208] 29. Pink Revision Pages 10/19/16
Oh!
Oh, my God. Uh, I think I know the answer to this question. But did anything happen to the cops?
Nope. They said it was a justified use of force.
Oh. That's horrible. Horrible. A quiet beat.

So, I was watching the news the other day and apparently there's this bulldog that set a world record for skateboarding through thirty people's legs. DD, you seen that clip. He was going through the legs like... Nikki mimics Otto the Skateboarding dog. The table is stunned by Nikki’s idiocy.
You know, that wasn't news. That was on Worldstar HipHop.
That's the news. DD, let's take a selfie.
All right. Let's do it quick, though. They pose.
Ready? Oh, this has to go on the gram.
Hey, Nikki, what is your username on there?
NipplesAndToes23. Joyce holds back a spit-take. (CONTINUED)

Oh. What was it again?
NipplesAndToes23.
Okay. Well, I'm gonna add you real quick. Wait-- So, NipplesAndToes43.
No, NipplesAndToes23.
(typing it in) Nipples and toes twenty-three.
Yeah.
Wait, is it nipples and the letter "N" toes or is it nipples ampersand toes...
10/19/16 25 No, it's nipples and the word, "and," a-n- d, toes twenty-three.
So, nipples, a-n-d toes.
Yes.
So, nipples...
...And toes...
Twenty-three.
So...
NipplesAndToes23. Joyce slams the table. (CONTINUED)

Yeah. Got the nipples. Got the toes. I 26 think it's very clear what her username is.
Everyone is watching Do The Right Thing. Nikki is laid ou on a couch.
Hey Dev.
What?
Do you mind scooting to the floor so I can stretch?
(annoyed) Sure.
